title: VIN Scanner
subtitle: Scan vehicle VINs using camera or upload images
dialog_subtitle: Scan vehicle VINs using the camera or upload an image for instant recognition.
status_no_vin: No VIN found. Try adjusting the lighting or focus.
status_invalid: Scanned text is not a valid VIN. Please rescan.
status_error: Something went wrong while scanning. Please try again.
camera_unavailable: Unable to access camera. Check browser permissions.
sticker_hint: Aim the camera at the VIN sticker and hold steady for best results.
plate_hint: Position the VIN plate within the camera frame and capture a clear image.
tip_lighting: Ensure good lighting on the VIN plate
tip_focus: Keep VIN plate in focus and centered
align_vin_sticker: Align VIN sticker within the guide
barcode_hint: Position the VIN barcode within the camera frame for instant scanning
